question: In which nation Mount Karthala is located?
explanation: Mount Karthala is located in Comoros. Mount Karthala is a very active shield volcano and the highest point of Comoros, part of the Grande Comore Island. The last major eruption happened in 2005. This mountain forms habitat to Humblot's flycatcher, Comoro white eye, Comoro drongo and Karthala scops owl. It is a Ramsar Wetland.
